snippet: A university system seeks to phase out the names (and administrators) of some campuses, as a way to save money and make it easier for students to seek out additional professors and services.
abstract: A university system seeks to phase out the names (and administrators) of some campuses, as a way to save money and make it easier for students to seek out additional professors and services.
lead_paragraph: The board of regents of the University System of Georgia has approved a plan by the chancellor, Henry Huckaby, to consolidate 8 of the system's 35 colleges and universities.

headline.main: Eight Campuses in Georgia University System to Combine
